shri lankan guwan sewaya landanaye sita kolambaa bala dinapatha yaweyi.thamange kopamana badubahiradiya thibuna da dayage paththara mitiya kolambaata genayannata kenek kamaththen idiripath weyi.hadisiye ewannek kalin munanogasuna hoth paththara mitiyak athin gath daya hithro guwan thotupole shri lankan kawuntaraya asala kanuwakata heththu wi sitinu dakagatha haki wiya.ee eya lankawata yana kawaraku atha ho yawa ehi puwathpath aayathana, hithawathun, yuda peramuna saha rasikayanata bedima sandahaya.
thawa duratath pramada wuwada junda meya atharamaga nawatha nodama naguta kese ho urannata puradu karanu athayi ohu wishwasa kaleya.

ookland aayathanaya wisin “yuddhaye digu sewanalla - pashchad yuda kalina shri lankawe yukthiya sadaha aragalaya" mayen yuthuwa mayi masayedi elidakwana lada warthawa magin ‘shri lanka aanduwa demala jathikayange saha anekuth sulu jathinge manawa himikam kramanukulawa ullanghanaya karamin sitina bawatada, demala janayage sampradayika nijabim thiwra hamudakaranayakata yatathkota, ema pradesha sinhala janapadakaranayakata lakkaramin yana bawatada’ chodana nanga thibuni.

walioya polisiya thuladi apayojanayata lakwa athi bawa kiyana 15 hawiridi pirimi daruwa pariwasa baladharinta saha anuradhapura kottasha lama ha kantha karyanshaye sthanadhipathiniyata siddhiya pilibandawa mul pa්rakashaya laba demin pawasa aththe thahadu sorakam kirime chodanawakata thaman walioya polisiya magin pasugiya mayi masa 8 da ath adanguwata gath bawayi .

mita amatharawa ranil wisin amarikawen igenagena aaweyayi ohuma kiyana kuta upakrama (hora, hora, hora yayi boru chodana nangima) nisa mahindage chanda padanama sulu washayen ho sura kamata hakiwimen siduwuye yali pibidunu demala saha muslim jathikawadaya haraha labunu anapekshitha chanda prathipalayata thawath rukulak pamani.2015 janawari 8 wani da chanda prathipalayath samangama rata pura daknata labu aithihasika thushnibhuthabhawaya, dewasiri mahatha kiyana aakaraye “sinhala jathikawadaya binda damu” aithihasika deshapalanika peraliyak kirimata sinhala janathawata uwamanawak “nothibu” bawata kadima sakshiyaki.2015 janawari 8 wani da thibu ema aithihasika thushnibhuthabhawayath, 2009 mayi 19 da rata pura athiwu sanakeli swabhawayath pahadiliwa penwanne podu janathawa balaporoththu wu prathipalaya saha balaporoththu nowu prathipalaya athara handunagatha haki wenasayi.
